snippet: Prosecutors used computer trails to show that Dharun Ravi was bothered by his roommate’s sexuality and that Tyler Clementi was aware of it.
abstract: Prosecutors use computer trails to show that Dharun Ravi was bothered by the sexual orientation of his Rutgers University roommate Tyler Clementi, who committed suicide after footage of his romantic encounter with another man was streamed on the Internet; Ravi faces charges that include bias intimidation, invasion of privacy and destruction of evidence.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors used computer trails to show that Dharun Ravi was bothered by his roommate’s sexuality and that Tyler Clementi was aware of it.

headline.seo: Tyler Clementi Monitored Dharun Ravi’s Twitter Posts About Him
headline.main: Rutgers Student Saw Twitter Posts by Roommate About Spying
headline.print_headline: Student Saw Twitter Posts By Roommate About Spying

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
